Are We in the Faith?
     \93We love him, because he first loved us.\94 [1 John 4:19.] It is impossible for us to believe that Jesus endured the untold agonies of the cross for us, without having our hearts melted in love for him. And if we love him, we shall be solicitous to please him, to obey him. The heart stirred by the love of Christ will earnestly inquire, \93Lord, what wilt thou have me to do?\94
